Dir.Group Leader HPC Software DesignDepartment of Computer ScienceChair of Computer Science 10 (System Simulation)Room: Room 00.115Cauerstraße 1191058 ErlangenPhone number: +49 9131 85-28359Fax number: +49 9131 85-28928Email: harald.koestler@fau.deWebsite: https://cs10.tf.fau.de/harald-koestler Office hours Tuesday 12:00 – 13:30 – only after prior registration by email –  send email Research interests: Software Engineering for High Performance Computing and Data Analytics Increasing computing power and the increasing amount of data enables us to significantly improve the mathematical models for various applications. We investigate the fusion of classical model-driven and data-driven approaches and their implementation in modern, open source research software. Our focus lies on code generation technology for numerical solvers or machine learning methods on (block)-structured data.
